work_history.title: AI/ML Engineer
work_history.description: Engineered and deployed full-stack Generative AI solutions within Azure, leveraging LangChain framework and Azure OpenAI LLMs to power agentic chatbots fully integrated with Microsoft Teams and Power Platform. Architected robust data pipelines syncing SharePoint documents to Azure vector databases for RAG systems.
achievements: Deployed full-stack Generative AI solution with LangChain and Azure OpenAI integrated with Microsoft Teams
Architected data pipeline syncing SharePoint to Azure vector database for RAG system
Enhanced RAG transparency by embedding direct SharePoint source links in LLM responses
Developed intelligent applications using Power Platform to enhance Army program operational efficiency

work_history.title: Sr. Data Scientist
work_history.description: Led and built the data science team from inception, shaping critical processes and workflows while mentoring staff. Enhanced data engineering capabilities and informed strategic decision-making on multi-billion dollar programs through complex data analysis and technical reporting to senior leadership.
achievements: Built data science team from inception and mentored staff in advanced analytics
Developed custom Python API wrappers for seamless data integration from Elasticsearch/Kibana and DoD platforms
Informed strategic decision-making on multi-billion dollar programs through actionable data analysis
Communicated data-driven insights to diverse stakeholders using ML and visualization tools

work_history.title: Sr. Data Engineer
work_history.description: Led technical projects as Technical Team Lead for Platform Support Team, engineering comprehensive data ingest and visualization pipelines. Created single database of Army's connected devices enabling Cyber leadership to visualize digital terrain.
achievements: Led technical projects and trained non-technical team members in Python and data skills
Engineered data ingest and visualization pipelines using Python, Elasticsearch, and Kibana
Created unified database of Army's connected devices for Cyber leadership visualization
Developed advanced utilities including parsers, web scraping tools, and analytics with dynamic UIs

work_history.title: Discovery Analyst
work_history.description: Led development and deployment of high-impact data science analytic projects across diverse domains including adtech data, network analysis, and geospatial intelligence for federal clients. Engineered full-stack data science solutions delivering massive operational efficiencies.
achievements: Delivered analytic that saved over 6,600 analyst hours within six months
Increased data processing volume by 875% through engineered solutions
Developed end-to-end data pipelines automating web scraping, API integration, and report generation
Designed custom tools for data querying and enrichment, providing training to technical and non-technical users
